author: Elizabeth Byrne And Peta Doherty
title: 'Stay calm and lie on your bed': Mother's words to child after she allegedly set their house on fire
description: An ACT judge says no bail restrictions would be enough to remove the risk of harm, given the woman had allegedly been willing to kill herself.
content:
Posted 
April 18, 2020 08:12:48
A child called out for a glass of water as smoke reached their bedroom after their mother allegedly set the house on fire, the ACT Supreme Court has heard.
Key points:
